name: Decapod Découpage - Browser Version
description:
Our game for Global Game Jam 2019. The theme for this year was "What home means to you".

Our team thinks of home as a place that's never settled or permanent. It's always moving, for better or worse.

In this game you collect decorations for your shell, treasure them, then leave them all behind and start again with a new shell. Enjoy endless fun and introspection.

Controls (Keyboard or DualShock 4 supported)

  • Move - arrow keys/joystick
  • Pick up item or shell - X
  • Drop  shell - Square / Space bar
